channel.title: Nexstar on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Nexstar on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Nexstar Ad Sales Down 9%, CW Owner Beats on Q2 Earnings
item.description: Nexstar reported its second-quarter 2025 earnings Thursday, revealing ad sales dropped 9% year over year for the April 1-June 30 period without a presidential election to fuel political ad spend. Wall
